Package com.seinksansdoozebank.fr.controller

Class GameFactory

java.lang.Object
com.seinksansdoozebank.fr.controller.GameFactory
public class GameFactory extends Object
Factory for the game exposing static methods to preset create games

    • createCustomGame

      public static Game createCustomGame (int numRandomBots, int numSmartBots, int numCustomBots, int numRichardBots, int numBuilderBots, int numOpportunistBots)
      Creates a new game instance based on the specified number of random bots, smart bots, and custom bots. This method initializes a game builder with a command-line interface and a deck, then adds the desired number of random bots, smart bots, and custom bots to the game builder. Finally, it builds and returns the constructed game.
      Parameters:
      numRandomBots - The number of random bots to be added to the game.
      numSmartBots - The number of smart bots to be added to the game.
      numCustomBots - The number of custom bots to be added to the game.
      numRichardBots - The number of Richard bots to be added to the game.
      numBuilderBots - The number of Builder bots to be added to the game.
      numOpportunistBots - The number of Opportunist bots to be added to the game.
      Returns:
      The newly created game instance.
